Nightlight/Termitron::

"I'm starting to look a hide Place, count with Termitron, count with 
the Loyal Termitron...!!!" said happily the bug bot and quickly he 
trasformed to beast mode and left the room.

As soon as Termitron left the room, Nightlight said "I don't know if 
I should say this... but I'm scared for us..."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>      "We'll go as soon as Termitron finds a secure location and I 
tell Windlord."  He holds Nightlight close to him.
